channel.title: How can I change the way an object faces (help!)
channel.description:
Project Insanity source.
How can I change the way my bank faces, it's currently facing east, I want to change it to face north ( but not by moving the coords, just moving the way it faces ).
Regards, James.

item.title: How can I change the way an object faces (help!)
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

Well, if i’m right new objects goes in ObjectManager.java

and u see something like


c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 3080, 9502, #, 10);

The # is face style.

u can change em to 1,2,3 or -1, -2, -3 not sure wich are what directions.

Read full topic
